text: The men's 4 × 100 metres relay event at the 2019 Summer Universiade was held on 12 and 13 July at the Stadio San Paolo in Naples. ==Medalists== {| |- |width=200 valign=top|' Daisuke Miyamoto Yoshihiro Someya Jun Yamashita Bruno Dede |width=200 valign=top|' Jiang Jiehua Jiang Hengnan Wang Yu Xuan Dajun |width=200 valign=top|' Lee Gyu-hyeong Ko Seung-hwan Mo Il-hwan Park Sie-young |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 2 teams in each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final.Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" |- !Rank !!
